sentences.en: "He's um ill in bed." — "Eh?" — "He's ill in bed."
sentences.cn: “嗯，他生病卧床。”——“什么？”——“他生病卧床。”

sentences.en: "I'm afraid he's ill." — "I'm sorry to hear that."
sentences.cn: “恐怕他生病了。”——“真是遗憾。”

sentences.en: a hospice for the terminally ill
sentences.cn: 晚期病人的安养院

sentences.en: Bridget can’t come – she’s ill.
sentences.cn: 布里奇特不能来了，她生病了。

sentences.en: Chantal would have considered it ill-mannered to show surprise.
sentences.cn: 钱特尔会认为表现出吃惊是失态的。

sentences.en: Ellis bristles at accusations that Berkeley's experiment is ill-conceived.
sentences.cn: 埃利斯对有人指责伯克利的实验考虑不够周密感到气愤。

sentences.en: England's footballers are back home after their ill-fated trip to Algeria.
sentences.cn: 英格兰足球队结束了倒霉的阿尔及利亚之行，回到了国内。

sentences.en: He was unable to join the army because of ill health.
sentences.cn: 他因为身体不好没法参军。

sentences.en: I was feeling ill that day and decided to stay at home.
sentences.cn: 我那天不太舒服，决定留在家里。

sentences.en: If damp, musty buildings make you ill, mould is probably the cause.
sentences.cn: 如果潮湿发霉的建筑令你生病了，霉菌很可能是病因。

sentences.en: In November 1941 Payne was seriously ill with pneumonia.
sentences.cn: 1941年11月，佩恩得了严重的肺炎。

sentences.en: In some perverse way the ill-matched partners do actually need each other.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，那些不相配的伴侣实际上却彼此需要。

sentences.en: It seemed a singularly ill-judged enterprise for Truman to undertake.
sentences.cn: 这对于杜鲁门来说似乎是一项特别不明智的事业。

sentences.en: It seemed she found it difficult to speak ill of anyone.
sentences.cn: 她似乎觉得说别人的坏话很难。

sentences.en: More than 100,000 people could fall ill after drinking contaminated water.
sentences.cn: 超过10万人可能会在饮用受到污染的水后患病。

sentences.en: She flew to their bedsides when they were ill.
sentences.cn: 在他们生病的时候她飞奔至他们身边。

sentences.en: She kept vigil at the bedside of her critically ill son.
sentences.cn: 她整夜都守在病重的儿子床边。

sentences.en: She was so ill that she was put on a respirator.
sentences.cn: 她病得很严重，被戴上了人工呼吸器。

sentences.en: The animals had been grossly ill-treated.
sentences.cn: 那些动物受到了恣意虐待。

sentences.en: The company's conservative instincts sit ill with competition.
sentences.cn: 该公司的保守本性不适合竞争。

sentences.en: These various complaints are part of a continuum of ill-health.
sentences.cn: 这些各种各样的疾病、不适都是身体健康状况欠佳的一种表现。
